detail_desc: Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, a hood, a zip down the front, and side pockets. Contrasting colour jersey trim around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Narrow metal Alice band decorated with faceted plastic beads and metal ball chain.
Short, wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with appliqués at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Raw, roll edges at the sleeves and hem.
Wide headband in a soft, fine knit with a decorative knot at the front.

Baby Exclusive. Blouse in soft, double-weave organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the back. Yoke at the top with embroidery front and back, and long sleeves with embroidery and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Triangle bikini top with lined cups, ties at the back and double ties at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless, cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a double-layered trim at the hem that wraps over at the front.
Hat in a soft, textured knit with a small imitation leather appliqué at the front and a ribbed hem.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a textured knit in soft chenille yarn with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned velour. Concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and a draped front with a plastic ring at one side.
Sports tights in cotton jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Top in soft cotton with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves with decorative seams, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. V-neck, a knot detail at the top and lightly padded cups with removable inserts.

Nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, opening with ties at the top and butterfly sleeves with smocking on the shoulders. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Pool shoes with a plastic foot strap and moulded soles that are patterned underneath. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
Wrapover jersey top with a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit merino wool with buttons down the front and front pockets.
Fitted, long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck front and back and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the front and lined skirt.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Thick socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with foldover tops.

Jumpsuit in satin with a sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and a slightly deeper, lace-trimmed neckline.
Hat in soft, rib-knit chenille with a soft faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scallop-edged cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined.
Flared trousers in a superstretch weave with a high waist, concealed zip and button in one side and slim, flared legs with sewn-in creases front and back.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a crossover straps at the back and an elasticated hem.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Lace jumpsuit with trousers in sturdy jersey. Wider neckline, cap sleeves and a seam with an inset section at the waist. Trousers with pleats at the top, side pockets and tapered legs with creases. Concealed zip at the back. Partly lined at the top.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Straight-cut cardigan in fine-knit long-staple cotton with a silver-plated zip down the front. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Shorts in lightweight, denim-look sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend. Elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and back pockets.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in sturdy jersey with a boned, V-neck opening at the front and long sleeves.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with 3/4-length puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length pyjama bottoms in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in rolled-up edges at the hems.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front with a chin guard, a fake flap pocket on the tummy, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, zip at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, pleats and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.

Coat in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, side pockets and one inner pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and press-stud at the cuffs, air holes under the arms and a single back vent. Lined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Top in stretch jersey crêpe with a round neckline and long sleeves with inset lace trims and lace-trimmed cuffs with a concealed press-stud. Cuffed hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with patch front pockets and no buttons. Patterned satin lining.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short top in textured jersey with elastication and a small frill trim at the top, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and smocking and a flounce at the hem.
